phone_numbers.title: Child Benefit Helpline
phone_numbers.description:
Call HMRC for information about eligibility, claiming and stopping Child Benefit, changing your personal details and making a complaint.

HMRC can only discuss your claim with you or someone you have authorised as your representative. A partner or someone else can get general advice but they must be authorised to discuss a claim with the helpline.
phone_numbers.open_hours:
8am to 8pm, Monday to Friday
8am to 4pm Saturday

Closed Sundays, Christmas Day, Boxing Day, and New Year’s Day
phone_numbers.best_time_to_call: Phone lines are less busy between 8am and 11am, Wednesday to Friday

details.more_info_phone_number:
Please have your National Insurance number or Child Benefit number with you when you call.

Get help dealing with HMRC if you have additional needs.

post_addresses.title: HM Revenue and Customs - Child Benefit Office
post_addresses.description: Write to HMRC for information about eligibility, claiming and stopping Child Benefit, changing your personal details and making a complaint.

details.more_info_post_address: If you’re sending a complaint, write ‘complaint’ on the envelope.
